thread.title: West Feliciana Parish sheriff's deputy arrested for assault
thread.title_full: West Feliciana Parish sheriff's deputy arrested for assault - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: West Feliciana Parish sheriff's deputy arrested for assault
text:
ST. FRANCISVILLE, La. (AP) - A West Feliciana Parish sheriff's deputy has been arrested on a simple assault charge.
WBRZ-TV reports ( http://bit.ly/1G5ZEAd ) the deputy, Shane Lofton, surrendered on the charge Wednesday. The simple assault charge stems from an unrelated altercation Lofton had in Avoyelles Parish. Lofton allegedly threatened to kill another off-duty deputy.
Lofton also was recently accused of using racial slurs against black people during a traffic stop last week.
Lofton was only in jail for 20 minutes before being released on a $5,000 bond. It was unknown if he has an attorney.
Information from: WBRZ-TV, http://www.wbrz.com
